content.chorus:
Jesus Lord, I ask for mercy
Let me not implore in vain
All my sins mow detest them
Never will I sin again
verses:
God of mercy and compassion
Look with pity upon me;
Father, let me call the father,
Tis thy child return to thee.

By my sins I have deserved
death and endless misery:
Hell with all its pains and torments
And for all eternity

By my sins I have abandoned
Right and claim to heaven above;
Where the saints rejoice forever
In a boundless sea of love

See our savioue, bleeding,dying
On the cross if calvary;
To that cross my sins have nailed him 
Yet he died and dies for me.
